articles.title: Red Sox edge Athletics 5-4 in 10 innings for 11th walk-off win of the year
articles.description:
The Red Sox, who are 21-26 in one-run games this season, went 3 for 17 with runners in scoring position and are 7 for 38 (.184) in such situations through the first five games of this six-game homestand.

The post Red Sox edge Athletics 5-4 in 10 innings for 11th walk-off win of the year appeared first on Boston.com.
